text: (Baba vaAbrahamu Azaru) vakabva vati: “Uri kuramba anamwari vangu here, nhai (iwe) Ibrahim (Abrahamu)? (Iwe Ibrahim) ukasamira kuita izvi (ukaramba uchindiparidzira uchiramba anamwari vangu), zvirokwazvo ndichakutema (nematombo). Uye chibva pandiri (izvezvi) uchindisiya ndiri murunyararo (ndisati ndakuranga).”
